descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-0-1496283169.jpg[/img]
Dove The Elf
Body:CBBE
Weapons: Bow, dagger
Armor: Light Armor
Marriage:√
Location：
2:00 ~ 21:00 The Winking Skeever Solitude
21:00 ~ 2:00 Hall of the Dead Solitude 

Spells:Conjure sister Dornaa Eva's soul, Conjure Swarm, Spriggan Concentration, Call Creatures, Elf Cloak, Elf Armor etc...
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-0-1496285160.jpg[/img]
[u][b]If you enter the game for the first time you can not find her. You just need to quit and then re-enter the game you can find her.[/b][/u]

Elf Cloak: Opponents in melee range take <10> points poison damage per second. (Lv.10)
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-0-1496283668.jpg[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-1-1496283866.jpg[/img][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-0-1496283866.jpg[/img][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-0-1496284611.jpg[/img]

Elf Armor:Improves the caster's armor rating by <mag> points for 300 seconds.(Lv.10)
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-1-1496324918.jpg[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-0-1496283975.jpg[/img]

Spriggan Concentration: A swarm that does <mag> poison damage for 3 seconds.(LV.10)[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-1-1496284446.jpg[/img][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-0-1496284446.jpg[/img]

Conjure sister Dornaa Eva's soul: Conjure Part Of Dornaa Eva's Soul(Lv.86)
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-1-1496284872.jpg[/img][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-0-1496284872.jpg[/img]

Dove's sister, Dornaa Eva:
Spells:Frost Breath Shout, Elf Cloak X, Spriggan Matron Concentration, IceSpike
Location:Hall of the Dead Catacombs Solitude
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84309-17-1496283163.jpg[/img]
